result.title: Guide on the inclusion of suburban districts in SUMPs
result.description:
Second of a series of specific guidance on a number of horizontal issues, drawing on the experiences of the demonstration measures. These will look at three topics:
• The financing, procurement and contracting of SUMP measures • The inclusion of suburban districts in SUMPs • Addressing vulnerable groups and gender issues in SUMPs
The guidance will draw directly on the outcomes of the thematic webinars being held within WP9.

result.description: This deliverable will report on the demonstration of MaaS, requirements validation and evaluation of the final MaaS4EU product in the Greater LUX region pilot.
